about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling VR adventure as a member of a special forces team sent to a mysterious island in search of survivors after a military aircraft goes down. But as you soon as you land you discover the island is home to a native population that practices forms of witchcraft and demonic rituals, and no outsider has ever been allowed on the island. Experience intense combat as you battle against hordes of hostile enemies, as what starts as a rescue mission turns into an escape for survival.

Campaign

Play as Sgt. Kimball and experience the journey first hand.

- 3 game difficulties.

- 9 missions

- 2 Boss fights / 8 different enemy types

50 Days

Starting off with just a bow, survive for 50 days in an increasingly difficult zone and try to earn yourself a top spot on the leaderboard. Your choice in upgrades matters, choose strategically. The game starts at a slow pace but will drastically increase in difficulty, use this time for scouting and looting. Enemies will increase in damage, speed and health every 5 days. New enemy types will start showing up after certain day milestones as well as a mini boss every 10 days. Death is permanent!

New crates will spawn each morning randomly all around the map, increasing in number as new areas are unlocked around the map.

Loot crates for weapon/player talent points, gun parts and ammo.



Point system based on kills/boss bonuses for ranked leaderboard

Plan accordingly through day and night cycles as this changes the aggressiveness of all enemies and can bring out some nocturnal ones!
detailed_description:
Embark on a thrilling VR adventure as a member of a special forces team sent to a mysterious island in search of survivors after a military aircraft goes down. But as you soon as you land you discover the island is home to a native population that practices forms of witchcraft and demonic rituals, and no outsider has ever been allowed on the island. Experience intense combat as you battle against hordes of hostile enemies, as what starts as a rescue mission turns into an escape for survival.

Campaign

Play as Sgt. Kimball and experience the journey first hand.

- 3 game difficulties.

- 9 missions

- 2 Boss fights / 8 different enemy types

50 Days

Starting off with just a bow, survive for 50 days in an increasingly difficult zone and try to earn yourself a top spot on the leaderboard. Your choice in upgrades matters, choose strategically. The game starts at a slow pace but will drastically increase in difficulty, use this time for scouting and looting. Enemies will increase in damage, speed and health every 5 days. New enemy types will start showing up after certain day milestones as well as a mini boss every 10 days. Death is permanent!

New crates will spawn each morning randomly all around the map, increasing in number as new areas are unlocked around the map.

Plan accordingly through day and night cycles as this changes the aggressiveness of all enemies and can bring out some nocturnal ones!
name: A Terrible Place

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: i7+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam Index, Oculus, Vive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i9 +
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070+ or equiv
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam Index, Oculus, Vive

short_description: What seems like a simple mission turns into a fight for survival as the island wakes up to greet its new arrivals.
